channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Workout Headphones We Tested and Sweated In (2025)
item.description: Rock your inner jock with a pair of sturdy, sweatproof, and tangle-proof headphones. Here are our favorites.

item.title: Uptime Industries wants to boost localized AI usage with an ‘AI-in-a-box’ called Lemony AI
item.description: The Lemony AI device can run large language models, AI agents and automated workflows locally.

item.title: 14 Best Hair Straighteners We Tested (2025)
item.description: Curls and waves are beautiful. But when you want to smooth them out, these WIRED-tested hot tools—irons, brushes, and combs—work wonders.

item.title: Senators Warn DOGE’s Social Security Administration Work Could Break Benefits
item.description: "This rush job risks people’s private data, creates security gaps, and could result in catastrophic cuts to all benefits," Senator Elizabeth Warren sa...

item.title: Pinterest tests an AI feature that lets advertisers turn their catalogs into shoppable collages
item.description: Pinterests is experimenting with "auto-collages," an AI feature that allows advertisers to quickly turn their product catalogs into shoppable collages...

item.title: The Viral Storm Streamers Predicting Deadly Tornadoes—Sometimes Faster Than the Government
item.description: Storm streamers are using radars and AI robots to predict extreme weather for millions of YouTube subscribers, in some cases faster than the National ...

item.title: 23andMe says 15% of customers asked to delete their genetic data since bankruptcy
item.description: More than two dozen states have sued 23andMe to block the sale of genetic data without customers' permission.

item.title: The Browser Company launches its AI-first browser, Dia, in beta
item.description: With its built-in AI interface, Dia hopes to give people an easy way to use AI, cutting out the need to visit tools like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Clau...

item.title: 8 Best Cordless Vacuums for Your Whole House (2025)
item.description: Clean your house without the restraint of a power cord with these cordless stick vacuums.

item.title: Standard Nuclear emerges from the ashes of a failed startup
item.description: Standard Nuclear was the winning bidder for Ultra Safe Nuclear Corporation's fuel-related assets at a bankruptcy auction.
